title: Hungry In Dungeon 2D
descriptions: • This project 2D RPG that was created by our group for FPT Aptech.
• A RPG game with a linear story-telling and gameplay similar to the classic Zelda game

title: Meow Battle 3D
descriptions: • This project 3D Esport that was created by our group for FPT Aptech.
• A 3D online multiplayer game based on the gameplay of the classic Bomberman game involving adorable cats

title: Kingdom Troop 3D RPG
descriptions: • This is a 3D RPG game that we developed in 5 days for a competition.
• We focused on graphics and lighting in Unity, drawing inspiration from Dark Souls 3.
